Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — eight quatrains (aaab) with ‘Ora pro nobis’ refrain and burden: ‘Sancta maria ora pro nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O trychin of the triniteReplete with alle
                    diuinite…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And come to blysse celestialleOra pro
                    nobis
